name: Divine Legacy (itch)
description:
• Detailed and lively graphics
  • Intense real-time action combat system
  • 5 playable characters, each with a different and unique combat style
  • Extra concept artworks
  • Hidden collectibles
  • Extra post-story content
  • Extra, optional cutscenes and hidden dialogues
  • 8 levels of difficulty
  • Secret unlockable content

If you like this game, please consider supporting me on Patreon!

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=51362316

NOTE: Windows Defender might find a false positive in the executable. It is a known issue with Enigma Virtual Box; this does not happen with the steam version
